phrases: I am Aono Tsukune, 15 years old.
I will be a sparkling high school student...supposedly...
Damn it, it is an all boys school for the next three years.
It only takes an hour to get to school.
There is lots of cute girls over there.
Well... you do not need to get so depressed over not being able to make the grade.
You will be able to make it by next year!
Let us go to an arcade before we head home.
It is about that new game, right?
I happened to meet a priest today.
What a good person he is.
With this, Tsukune will become a high school student this summer!
But was not this dropped by someone?
You will not have to repeat this year again then.
Are you a freshman at Youkai Academy?
Then you should be mentally prepared.
but are you going to Youkai Academy?
Since my favourite cousin is attending that school,
I did some research on it.
This is like a totally different world after we entered the tunnel.
Oh yeah, I need to call Kyou-chan back.
I still had reception before we entered the tunnel though...
This is the right way, right...?
What the hell, just a bat after-
Sorry, my eyes went blurry because I am anemic.
Sorry, I did not mean to do it, sorry!
The scent coming from the hair is nice...
Are you also from the Youkai Academy?
Y-Yeah, though I am a freshman...
That is great, I am a freshman too!
So it is interesting since you bumped into me.
Then will you be my friend?
I do not know anyone here and I was feeling worried.
I am going to spend my high school days with this beautiful girl,
I think I am extremely lucky!
I am your form room teacher, Nekonome Shizuka.
The teacher seems to be very friendly, what a good feeling.
I am sure everyone already knows this,
But this is a school for monsters!
As of now, the world is under control of the humans.
we have to coexist with the humans!
All students must be in their human form unless special situations arise.
No other students should know your true form.
Why do not we just eat those humans?
That is what I would do, teacher.
But you should not do that.
Because the school's staffs and students from head to toe, are all monsters.
We are inside a secret barrier.
will be killed on the spot.
Now that you mention it, I smelt a human scent just now...
Sorry for being a bit late!
This girl is so hot, do not you think she is cute?
We are in the same class?
Yeah, it must be a dream after all.
There is no way that a school for monsters exists.
It is delicious is not it?
But, if she is really a vampire...
Can you tell me why a beautiful lady like you is hanging out with such a guy like this?
Do not bother with that trash, come play with me.
That was scary... are you really alright, Tsukune?
Yeah, but that was quite a throw.
Is that the power of a monster?
It is like you are seeing a monster for the first time.
That is right Tsukune, what kind of monster are you?
Oh yeah, giving out your identity is against the school rules, sorry about that.
But you already revealed to me that you are a vampire.
I was not aware of the rule back then.
But you do not seem like one.
What... do you want me to see?
Once this rosary is taken off, I will turn into a terrifying, true vampire.
That is why this is a protective seal...
I cannot even take this off myself.
Even if you are a little scary...
You are my first friend, Tsukune!
Until today, I have only imbibed tomato juice and blood transfusion packets, so...
I have got to do something.
She really is different from me.
I felt that you were... acting strange, so...
I was thinking of going to a school for humans.
Even though you are a good person Moka-san, it is impossible for me to go to this school!
You cannot go to a school for humans!
I went to a school for humans during junior high.
I was lonely because humans do not believe in monsters.
It would be better if I did not exist!
I kept thinking about such things.
But you told me it is alright even if I am a vampire!
That is why for the first time, I did not feel alone...
What if I am one of those humans that you hate,
I only got into this school because of some mistake!
Humans should not be able to enter this school...
You hate humans, do not you?
I do not want to befriend monsters either!
Where are you off to, Moka-san?
This is my real form, an orc!
Do not tell me it is that Saizou guy?
Even if a human like me went back...
It is against school rules to transform!
We are outside the school, so it is fine!
Even though I do not know what monster you are,
The differences between humans and monsters are just too much.
Back in my previous school, what I had really wanted was a friend...
Being human or monster does not matter,
But I guess it really is impossible.
What the hell are you doing?
Indeed, I am weak and worthless, but,
Human or monster, I want to be Moka-san's friend!
Even if you are a vampire...
She is like a totally different person!
Once this rosary gets taken off, I will turn into a terrifying, true vampire.
Could this be a true vampire...?
It is just like the rumours say...
So she is an S-Class Monster, a vampire?!
You are the one who awakened me from my slumber, huh?
What is wrong with my body...
I am trembling just from looking at her!
Who cares if it is a vampire!
You should realise your own place.
I will be aware of it from now on.
She is completely different from the Moka-san a moment ago...
Thank goodness you are awake, Tsukune!
Was that a dream just now?
is not based on time, but day...
Does this bus only come once a month!?
I have to administer first aid immediately!
Dear Mom, Dad and also Kyou-chan...
Even though this cannot be mailed,
I am writing this as a memento.
This Youkai Academy that I am attending is a little strange,
So much so that I wanted to come back immediately.
However, I have decided to continue attending for a while,
as I found a new friend.
I really cannot resist this scent...
Could I have entered a really dangerous academy?
I will be stronger next episode
Not to mention there is a succubus!
Next, A Succubus and A Vampire
